pageTitle: Best Financial Advisors in Long Beach
metaDescription: Find top-rated financial advisors in Long Beach. Expert guidance for retirement planning, wealth management, and investment strategies.

advisors.name: Edward Jones - Financial Advisor: Michael A Shafer, AAMSÂ®

heroDescription: Long Beach, California, is a vibrant coastal city known for its diverse culture and economic opportunities.
landscapeDescription: Long Beach's economy thrives on trade, tourism, and healthcare, benefiting from its strategic port location. The city is also a hub for technology and manufacturing, contributing to its growth.
uniqueNeeds: Long Beach requires tailored financial strategies due to its unique economic landscape and diverse population.
citySpecificRiskAdvice: Long Beach's port-centric economy faces trade risks; real estate is volatile with rising prices. Prepare for natural disasters like earthquakes and consider diversifying investments.

sections.title: Economic Growth
sections.description: According to BEA (2023), Long Beach's GDP growth rate is projected at 3.5%, driven by trade and tourism recovery post-pandemic.

sections.title: Wealth Demographics
sections.description: According to Census (2023), the median household income in Long Beach is $76,000, reflecting a diverse economic base.

sections.title: Advisor Specializations
sections.description: Based on BLS (2023), financial advisors in Long Beach are increasingly specializing in real estate and retirement planning.

sections.title: Cost of Living
sections.description: According to BLS (2024), the cost of living in Long Beach is 15% higher than the national average, driven by housing and transportation costs.

sections.title: Real Estate Market
sections.description: According to Zillow (2024), Long Beach's housing market is competitive, with median home prices rising 10% year-over-year.

sections.title: Business Environment
sections.description: According to Fortune (2024), Long Beach ranks high for business innovation, particularly in logistics and tech startups.
